text: I didn't grow up identifying with beauty. I grew up thinking I could be smart and funny - those are the things I got feedback on.
author: Lauren Graham

text: Even if you play perfectly, a fault of your opponent's can destroy the entire beauty of the game.
author: Vladimir Kramnik

text: When I speak of the beauty of a game of chess, then naturally this is subjective. Beauty can be found in a very technical, mathematical game for example. That is the beauty of clarity.
author: Vladimir Kramnik

text: My mama told me in college, 'I love you, and you're God's child, but natural beauty will only take you so far.'
author: Robin Roberts

text: I have learned that acting is not about beauty.
author: Vincent Cassel
